text: João Bernardo "Nino" Vieira (, 27 April 1939 - 2 March 2009) was the President of Guinea-Bissau from 1980 to 1984, for the second time from 1984 to 1999, and for the third time from 2005 to 2009. Vieira was killed by soldiers on 2 March 2009."Guinea-Bissau president shot dead ", BBC, 2 March 2009 The military officially denied these allegations"Guinea-Bissau president 'killed in clash between rival soldiers'", The Guardian, 2 March 2009 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Murders by firearm Category:Assassinated people Category:Presidents of Guinea-Bissau Category:Prime Ministers of Guinea-Bissau Category:National presidents assassinated in the 21st century
title: João Bernardo Vieira
